metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7053 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Irssi before 1.0.7 and 1.1.x before 1.1.1. Thereis a use-after-free when SASL messages are received in an unexpected order.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7053` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.7').
